description: This source file defines the ApiKey class, which models API key entities in the backend application. It includes annotations for database persistence, fields for key metadata, and accessor methods.

classes.name: ApiKey
classes.description: Entity class representing an API key, storing hashed key, prefix, associated user, creation timestamp, and active status.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique ID of the API key.

methods.name: getPrefix
methods.description: Retrieves the prefix used for quick lookup.

methods.name: setPrefix
methods.description: Sets the prefix for the API key.

methods.name: getUser
methods.description: Gets the User associated with this API key.

methods.name: setUser
methods.description: Associates a User with this API key.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the creation timestamp of the API key.

methods.name: isActive
methods.description: Checks if the API key is active.

methods.name: setActive
methods.description: Sets the active status of the API key.
